name: To: Demon Lord, From: Mom
description:
Somebody has to deliver the packages.

You’re a postman delivering a package through a horrific dungeon, deeper and deeper dodging blazing firepits and getting impaled by spikes.

As a postman it’s your responsibility to get the package delivered no matter what comes by, no weather nor death may stop you fulfilling your duty as a postman.

  • GameplayDodge spikes and firepits in the hall by switching between lanes with “A” or “D”, you may encounter enemies. You click on either pound or punch to hit the enemy. If you feel like not taking a risk you can also dodge.
  • FIXES

Removed navigation UI. Now move between lanes with “A/D” Keys! Fixed pathing bug where path would break on battle Believe to have fixed bug with getting stuck in lanes Fixed bug where lane choices would be delayed.
